Talks

Several Lambda Ladies have given presentations about functional programming. Here are links for some of them.

  • Composing a Functional Community by Katie Ots (slides)
  • Concurrent Applications with F# Agents by Rachel Reese (slides)
  • Functional Algebra: Monoids Applied by Susan Potter (slides)
  • Functional Principles for OO Development by Jessica Kerr
  • Getting Started with F# by Rachel Reese
  • Learning Functional Programming Without Growing a Neckbeard by Kelsey Gilmore-Innis (slides)
  • Monads to the Rescue by Katie Ots (slides)
  • Why Haskell? by Susan Potter (slides)

If there is something you would like to see added to this page, please send us a message or a pull request.
